Item: Caledonian Sleeper: London Euston → Glasgow Central
Description: Board the overnight sleeper. Shared berths; grab a beer in the lounge car — the trip starts here. Arrives Glasgow ~07:00.
easyJet/BA from Heathrow Gatwick or Luton to Glasgow International. ~1hr 20min. Requires onward transfer to Ardrossan — adds faff.
Wake up in Scotland (train) or transfer from airport (flight). Grab coffee near the station.
Deep fried Mar's bars a-go-go
~50 min train through beuatiful Ayrshire timed to connect with the ferry.
55-minute crossing on the Firth of Clyde. First proper hit of sea air — it signals stag kick's off properly. Dan starts regailing us with stories about his Scottish ancestry.
Full for the hike!
Arran's highest peak at 874m. A 4–5hr return from Brodick. Stunning views to Ireland and the Highlands on a clear day. Trail starts a short walk from the village.
Last bus of the day on this route. ~40 mins of coastal scenery. Arrives Lochranza ~19:53. Don't miss it.
Drop bags shower change. Book the whole dorm for group privacy. Breakfast included.
Food and drink at a hotel a short walk from the hostel. Option to self-cater at hostel to limit group costs.
A bracing dip in the Firth of Clyde!
Hostel breakfast included in your £30.25. Fuel up before the morning hike.
A coastal walk. Stunning scenery and zero cost — perfect reset after Saturday.
Head back down for the morning activity. Departs Lochranza ~10:30 arrives Brodick ~11:10.
Annual whisky festival at the Arran Distillery in Brodick. Free entry with tastings master classes and distillery access. An extraordinary find — a free whisky festival as your stag send-off.
The island disappearing behind you — always a good sign you picked the right place.
Quick hop back to Glasgow.
